definition: grandiose but impractical (idiom)/large but of no real use
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)

sentences.english: But ponderous attempts to keep control may dampen the Olympic mood.
sentences.chinese: 不過，如此大而無當的控制只會敗壞了奧運氣氛。

sentences.english: I had never been close to Grandiose Project.
sentences.chinese: 我從來沒有接近大而無當項目。
